metadata.creator: PONY CANYON
metadata.description:
Nintendo Sound Series Vol. 6


Music Composer and Programmer:  Dave Wise (Rare)
Sound Effects Composer and Programmer:  Graeme Norgate (Rare)
Producer:  Kenji Kume (Pony Canyon)
Director:  Satoshi Kobayashi (Pony Canyon)
Mastering:  溝上由依子 (Pony Canyon)
Art Direction:  Yoshie Yokoyama (NPC)
Design:  Koji Kubota (NPC)
Sales Promotor:  Shoichi Tomura (Pony Canyon)
Art Coordination:  Kazunori Tatsuno (辰野和紀) (Pony Canyon)
